sentences.sentence: "Not to mention that the 5 c. d. c. acknowledged last year that no level of lead is really safe," Dr. Palfrey said.
sentences.translation: “更不用说去年疾病控制中心承认，并没有哪个水平的铅含量是真正安全的，”帕尔·弗雷博士说。

sentences.sentence: Because it is the largest Internet market in the world, it is impossible for a large technology company to ignore, 'Mr. Palfrey says.
sentences.translation: 因为它是世界上最大的互联网市场，大型科技公司无法忽视它的存在。
